item.description:
The Connecticut Business Connection is dedicated to helping businesspeople, executives, and entrepreneurs thrive in Connecticut. Our meetings provide a place to meet business owners and executives, learn new strategies for growing your business, and creating relationships.

 

Our meetings in Branford, Middletown, New Haven, Newington,  and West Hartford consist of open networking followed by introductions, a discussion topic or speaker geared towards providing you new ideas for your business, announcements, followed by more open networking.

 

We are an open networking group and do not limit the number of attendees from a specific industry. Topics of education have included social media, marketing, operations strategy, sales techniques, customer service, and more.

 

We look forward to seeing you.
item.name: Connecticut Business Connection
